Category:Solo: A Star Wars Story actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi actors

nodes.text: Jimmy Vee (born February 3, 1959) is a Scottish actor who portrayed R2-D2 in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, and Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, continuing the work of the late Kenny Baker. Vee stands at 1.12 meters tall, which allows him to fit into the can-like astromech droid bodies.
